column4: Hello! I have a problem with my sata harddrive. Anyone here who knows alot about sata harddrives and booting?
what is the prob
Correct because you are changint the effective ext partition that Ubuntu is on
ok how can i figure out which one that is?
Do you have any idea what it could be called?
what are you on now?
Also, everything works fine with out the other 2 drives
1 drive
sda1
no they are raided (clone) and empty
I can see grub though
You cant mix xp raid setup and ubuntu
its not XP... i formated everything before going into linux
the raid was done through ALI raid while booting
are you saying it will work without hardware raid?
You need to read that, you are not going to get both running under raid
ok...
yes, you unraid your xp setup
